name: Hunt Adventure: Real Duck
description:
Hunt Adventure: Real Duck is full of enjoyment and full of thrilling that trigger you for hunting the innocent ducks. The ducks are like birds so this game is birds hunting and duck hunting also.This duck hunting fever game is lots of fun and enjoyment for you that’s brings you is the real hunting game
Game Features:
- First person 3D Shooting
- Efficient Weapon control
- 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
- Real time Duck Hunting with animations
- Multiple Levels
